

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgKey, configuration_value as cfgValue
                          from product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'lejcuq7vlrrbv9np2u87r7vb14'
            and expiry > '1354847823';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir from template_select where template_language in (1, 0) order by template_language DESC;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((specials_date_available <= 20121207 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121207))
                       or ((specials_date_available <= 20121207 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (specials_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121207))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121207 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121207 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121207 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((featured_date_available <= 20121207 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121207))
                       or ((featured_date_available <= 20121207 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (featured_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121207))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121207 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121207 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121207 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '0'
                       and (((sale_date_start <= 20121207 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end > 20121207))
                       or ((sale_date_start <= 20121207 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (sale_date_start = '0001-01-01' and sale_date_end > 20121207))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and (20121207 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and ((20121207 >= sale_date_end and sale_date_end != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121207 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='ADMIN_DEMO';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from admin where admin_name='demo' or admin_name='Admin';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ip_address from admin_activity_log LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'lejcuq7vlrrbv9np2u87r7vb14';

sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((specials_date_available <= 20121207 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121207))
                       or ((specials_date_available <= 20121207 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (specials_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121207))
                       ;

                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121207 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;

sidebox:

          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ip_address from admin_activity_log LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                               from languages order by sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_PAYMENT_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_SHIPPING_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from coupon_gv_queue where release_flag='N';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT menu_key, language_key FROM admin_menus ORDER BY sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM product_types WHERE type_handler != 'product';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ap.menu_key, ap.page_key, ap.main_page, ap.page_params, ap.language_key as page_name
          FROM admin_pages ap
          LEFT JOIN admin_menus am ON am.menu_key = ap.menu_key WHERE ap.display_on_menu = 'Y' ORDER BY am.sort_order, ap.sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select r.*, rd.*, pd.*, p.* from (reviews r left join reviews_description rd on r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id left join products_description pd on r.products_id = pd.products_id and pd.language_id ='1' left join products p on p.products_id= r.products_id)  where r.products_id = p.products_id  order by pd.products_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total  from (reviews r left join reviews_description rd on r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id left join products_description pd on r.products_id = pd.products_id and pd.language_id ='1' left join products p on p.products_id= r.products_id)  where r.products_id = p.products_id ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select r.*, rd.*, pd.*, p.* from (reviews r left join reviews_description rd on r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id left join products_description pd on r.products_id = pd.products_id and pd.language_id ='1' left join products p on p.products_id= r.products_id)  where r.products_id = p.products_id  order by pd.products_name limit 0, 20;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select r.reviews_read, r.customers_name,
                                             length(rd.reviews_text) as reviews_text_size
                                      from reviews r, reviews_description rd
                                      where r.reviews_id = '5'
                                      and r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_image
                                        from products
                                        where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                                       from products_description
                                       where products_id = '5'
                                       and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select (avg(reviews_rating) / 5 * 100) as average_rating
                                         from reviews
                                         where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '5'
                             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '4'
                             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '4'
                             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '4'
                             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                             from products_description
                             where products_id = '1'
                             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, master_categories_id from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * from project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database' ORDER BY project_version_date_applied DESC LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'lejcuq7vlrrbv9np2u87r7vb14';
